snippet.description:
Duck Sauce - It's You is out now.
QUACK Album, DOWNLOAD it here: http://bit.ly/1rc6zzs
Grab your copy on iTunes here: http://bit.ly/14Lopih
Listen to more songs like this with our playlist!
Apple Music: https://itunes.apple.com/it/curator/ego/1405705875
Spotify: http://spoti.fi/2qnkdCG

Follow Ego on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/EgoItaly
Subscribe to EgoTV NOW: http://bit.ly/1hzlXkS

Duck sauce is the sweet and sour flavour condiment offered at all Chinese-American restaurants. Duck Sauce is Armand Van Helden and A-Trak. They met in New York City, make house music and eat Chinese food. In 2010-2011 they literally filled everyone's ears with their smashing hit "Barbra Streisand". The song peaked at number one in Belgium, the Netherlands, Poland, Finland, Switzerland, Austria and Norway. It became a Top10 hit in Italy, UK, France, Germany, Ireland and Australia. In 2011, the song received a Nomination in 54th Grammy Awards for Best Dance Recording. It also reached #1 Billboard Hot Dance Club Songs chart.
As you know the duck never stops its quack quack and "It's You" is the new single by Duck Sauce. Worldwide promo just started and "It's You" gets itself talked about almost everywhere, from the US to Japan. It conquered Europe as well, hitting the dance floors in Belgium, the Netherlands, France and UK. It's a real bomb. Well, we should mention that "It's You" is the perfect song for a barber shop. It's the most amazing and suitable soundtrack for a hip haircut, dreadlock, afro head, Mohawk, hair extensions, fluorescent dye or a gorgeous teasing. Duck Sauce combs and brushes us with its new massive single (and video!).
The sauce makes the difference. Be sure to dress your music with the best one in circulation.
snippet.title: DUCK SAUCE - It's You (Official Video)
